message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned earlier.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. While I acknowledge your perspective on the price, I believe the product's value warrants a higher price point.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,500?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,750?
